title: GetBACnetLightingCommandProperty (Method)
text:
METHOD GetBACnetLightingCommandProperty : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_LIGHTING_COMMAND
Returns the BACnetLightingCommand of the specified Property (propID) of this BACnet-Object as a CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_LIGHTING_COMMAND struct.
The used functions are no client, meaning, that the access of the property is not restricted by write or read access restrictions.

rows.Name: propID
rows.Comment: The ID of the property to get.
